definitions.definition: Of or relating to industry , notably manufacturing .
examples: The industrial segment of the economy has seen troubles lately.
Handicraft is less standardized then industrial products, hence less artistic or rather flawless.

definitions.definition: Suitable for use in such industry; industrial- grade .
examples: This is an industrial product—it's much too strong for home use.

definitions.definition: Employed as manpower by such industry.

examples: Italy is a part- industrial , part-rural nation.

definitions.definition: Belonging or pertaining to the genre of industrial music .
examples: a track with clashing industrial beats

main_definition: Of or relating to industry , notably manufacturing .
secondary_definitions: Suitable for use in such industry; industrial- grade .
Employed as manpower by such industry.
( of a society or country ) Having many industries; industrialized .
( music ) Belonging or pertaining to the genre of industrial music .
